title: Contour Cafe: larger Seven Balance wall-frame label + neon green frame edge glow

requirements.summary: Make the "Seven Balance" WallFrameLabel text significantly larger and keep it crisp/centered in both BasicCafeRoomFallback and CafeSceneDressing.
acceptanceCriteria: In the BasicCafeRoomFallback menu board label, the rendered "Seven Balance" text is visibly larger than before and remains crisp (not blurry/pixelated) when viewed from the default camera position.
In the CafeSceneDressing menu board label, the rendered "Seven Balance" text is visibly larger than before and remains crisp (not blurry/pixelated) when viewed from the default camera position.
The text remains centered on the label plane and does not clip outside the label area.

file_operations.description: Improve label texture sharpness and fit: increase effective texture resolution for large text, add safe padding/margins, and ensure the canvas text rendering stays centered and does not clip when using a larger fontSize.
Increase the "Seven Balance" WallFrameLabel sizing for the fallback menu board (e.g., larger fontSize and/or label plane dimensions) while keeping the label centered and within the board area.
Increase the "Seven Balance" WallFrameLabel sizing for the full scene menu board (e.g., larger fontSize and/or label plane dimensions) while keeping the label centered and within the board area.

requirements.summary: Add a neon green glow effect on the menu board frame edge in both BasicCafeRoomFallback and CafeSceneDressing without z-fighting.
acceptanceCriteria: In BasicCafeRoomFallback, the menu board frame edge shows a clearly visible neon green glow when viewed from the default camera position.
In CafeSceneDressing, the menu board frame edge shows a clearly visible neon green glow when viewed from the default camera position.
The glow effect is applied to the frame edge (not the whole wall/board surface) and does not introduce obvious z-fighting artifacts.

file_operations.description: Create a small reusable 3D helper component that renders a neon-green edge-glow around a rectangular frame (e.g., via an edge/outline render and/or a slightly offset emissive halo geometry) with parameters to avoid z-fighting.
Wire the new MenuBoardFrameGlow component into the fallback menu board group so only the frame edge gets a visible neon green glow, using slight positional/size offsets to prevent z-fighting.
Wire the new MenuBoardFrameGlow component into the full scene menu board group so only the frame edge gets a visible neon green glow, using slight positional/size offsets to prevent z-fighting.
